# Ä†wiczymy Razem (Riff Quest)

> A comprehensive guitar exercise tracker and community platform designed to help musicians build consistent practice habits, track progress, and compete in a gamified environment.

## Key Features

- **Practice Tracking**: Log your guitar practice sessions with dynamic metronomes and stopwatches.
- **Gamification**: Earn XP, level up, and unlock achievements as you practice.
- **Leaderboards**: Compare your progress with the community and stay motivated.
- **Activity Calendar**: Visual GitHub-style representation of your practice consistency.
- **Songs & Exercises**: Access a library of songs and exercises to work on.
- **Personalized Stats**: Detailed breakdown of your practice history across different categories.

## Main Content

- [Home](https://riff.quest/) - The landing page and entry point to the platform.
- [Guitar Practice Builder](https://riff.quest/guitar-practice-builder) - Interactive tool to create specialized, printable guitar practice routines.
- [Song Recommender](https://riff.quest/what-guitar-song-to-learn) - Find the perfect song to learn based on your skill level and genre.
- [Blog](https://riff.quest/blog) - Knowledge hub for guitarists, featuring technique tips and practice psychology.
- [Guide](https://riff.quest/guide) - A step-by-step guide for new users to get started with Riff Quest.
- [Practice Habits](https://riff.quest/blog/practice-habits) - Comprehensive guide on building effective guitar practice habits.
- [Guitar Practice Routine](https://riff.quest/blog/guitar-practice-routine) - Expert advice on structuring your daily practice routine.
- [Guitar Practice Tracker](https://riff.quest/blog/guitar-practice-tracker) - Detailed information on how to use the Riff Quest tracking features.
- [About](https://riff.quest/about) - Learn about the mission and vision behind Riff Quest.
- [Privacy Policy](https://riff.quest/privacy-policy) - Information on how we handle and protect your data.

## Technical Details

- **Responsive Design**: Fully optimized for mobile and desktop devices.
